title: Don't Pay Zeke, Rodgers bounce back with Josh Hermsmeyer (Football 8/17)
description:
Will Brinson, Sean Wagner-McGough and John Breech break down the latest NFL news, including Andrew Luck's status (2:00), Baker Mayfield claiming people want the Browns to lose (12:00) and much more before tackling the latest episode of "Hard Knocks" (20:00). Then Will and Sean interview Josh Hermsmeyer of 538 and Establish the Run to talk about why Aaron Rodgers will bounce back (30:00), how teams can run play action without actually running (36:00), why the Cowboys shouldn't pay Zeke Elliott and what they should do with Dak (39:00), the idea of drafting two  quarterbacks in the first round (44:00), what run/pass efficiency says about a team (51:00) and much more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
